title: In new Ukraine loan-program talks, IMF flags central bank independence
text:
In new Ukraine loan-program talks, IMF flags central bank independence

Economy 10 minutes ago (Sep 27, 2019 01:31AM ET)

In new Ukraine loan-program talks, IMF flags central bank independence KIEV (Reuters) - The International Monetary Fund has had productive discussions about assisting Ukraine with a new three-year loan program but stressed the need to safeguard central bank independence and financial stability, a statement said on Friday. As it left Ukraine after two weeks of meeting stakeholders, the IMF said discussions on the new program would continue in the coming weeks.

In new Ukraine loan-program talks, IMF flags central bank independence
description: In new Ukraine loan-program talks, IMF flags central bank independence
